GSD.description: The implementations of PKCS#1 v1.5 key transport mechanism for XMLEncryption in JBossWS and Apache WSS4J before 1.6.5 is susceptible to a Bleichenbacher attack.

product_data.product_name: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5 for RHEL 4
Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5 for RHEL 5
Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 5 for RHEL 6

description_data.value: A flaw was found in JBoss web services where the services used a weak symmetric encryption protocol, PKCS#1 v1.5. An attacker could use this weakness in chosen-ciphertext attacks to recover the symmetric key and conduct further attacks.

description.value: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm

advisories.description: The implementations of PKCS#1 key transport mechanism for `XMLEncryption` Apache WSS4J is susceptible to a Bleichenbacher attack.
advisories.title: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm

description_data.value: A flaw was found in JBoss web services where the services used a weak symmetric encryption protocol, PKCS#1 v1.5. An attacker could use this weakness in chosen-ciphertext attacks to recover the symmetric key and conduct further attacks.
